p: These studies showed that phloridzin had multiple pharmacological activities, such as antidiabetic, anti-inflammatory, antihyperglycemic, anticancer and antibacterial activities. Besides, the physiological effects of phloridzin are cardioprotective, neuroprotective, hepatoprotective, immunomodulatory, antiobesity, antioxidant activities and so on ( Table 4, Figure 2).
